item.title: Expanded FH Customisation 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 2, 2025

Expanded FH Customisation 1.55 ETS2

This mod mainly focuses on adding more tuning parts to the SCS Volvo FH6, but also adds some stuff to the FH5 and FH4.

– Added fully chrome doorhandles from the FH4 to the FH5 and 6.
– Added half chrome doorhandles from the FH5/6 to the FH4.
– Added FH5 skylights from the FH tuning pack to the FH4.
– Added FH4 skylights from the FH tuning pack to the FH5.
– Added stacks from the FH tuning pack to the FH6.
– Unlocked some HS Schoch stuff on the FH5.
– Added HS Schoch stuff to the FH6.
– Added FH4 paints to the FH5 and 6.
– Added FH5 paints to the FH4 and 6.
– Added FH6 paints to the FH4 and 5.
– Added FH16 window trim to the FH4.
– Added 2020 tables to the FH4.

Credits: Snarfv

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Volvo FH 2022 Megamod v1.9.03p 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 2, 2025

Volvo FH 2022 Megamod v1.9.03p 1.55 ETS2

Features
– 3 Cabins (with and without side windows)
– 23 chassis models
– 5 interior styles with UK version
– 14 types of seats
– Realistic sounds
– a large number of accessories to choose
– fully digital dashboard with fading digits, ambient light etc.
– realistic main screen with various screens
– additional corner blind spot camera
– functioning blind spot sensors
– High quality wheels

Compatibility: 1.55

Credits:
We dont have any information about the author of this mod. If you are an author, please contact us or leave a comment below and we will add your credits.

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: Project Russia – Aldimator Rusmap RC v3.0.1 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 2, 2025

Project Russia – Aldimator Rusmap RC v3.0.1 ETS2

This mod fixes navigation issues at Klin, connects M-11 outside of Moscow, merges Sheremetyevo Alexander S. Pushkin International Airport

Load Order:
Project Russia – Aldimator Rusmap RC
Project Russia – Aldimator Rusmap Fix
Project Russia files
Rusmap files

Removes sensitive content

item.title: Pack Acessrios Iveco Stralis v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 1, 2025

Pack Acessrios Iveco Stralis v1.0 ETS2

This pack adds several accessories for the original Stralis to your game. With a wide range of variations, you can customize your truck from a 4×2 to an 8×4, with arched options. I offer two cabin options.
Among the accessories, I include custom headlights, exhaust outlets, 3-way valves, illuminated and digital signs, a hydraulic tank, a radio, and many others.
I also include SkinEdit, so that, with a simple image editor and a specific program, you can create your own skins and play with them.

Credits: TONHO NUNES

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Scania NTG R e S TCD v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 1, 2025

Scania NTG R e S TCD v1.0 ETS2

This mod adds Scania R and S NTG to your game. With a wide range of variations, you can configure your truck from 4×2 to 8×4.
I let customers decide the height using the in-game controls for the cambered options,
and through the console, use the code g_suspension_auto_reset “0”. I offer two cab options: standard and highline.
I’ve added over 35 accessories, including bumpers with miles, exhaust outlets, 3-way valves,
illuminated and digital signs, a hydraulic tank, a radio, and many others. The PXs have gained new antenna options.
I brought the SUPER powertrain, presented at Fenatran 2022.
I added 29 skins for the R and 32 for the S to the mod.
I made two skins: the 770 and the Super. The remaining three came from a friend and 56 from another friend, who kindly donated his work. (Paulo Henrique Jr)
Another exclusive feature is the opportunity to use the modshop app. Download it at https://modshop.com.br/modshop-edit/.
With it, you can easily change the lettering on the sign, even if you don’t know how to edit data.
You can edit the lights and the windshield slogan in-game, choosing the letters and creating names.
I also bring SkinEdit, so that, with a simple image editor and a specific program, you can create your own skins and play with them.

Credits: TONHO NUNES

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD
